org.svvrl.goal.core.tran

Class TranslationConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.TranslationConstants

  • public class TranslationConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some common translation options.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DefaultDelegateTranslation
      The default of the option of applying the delegation of an un-quantified formula to another translation algorithm, which is true
      static boolean DefaultReduceBeforeMerge
      The default value of the option of reducing unreachable and dead states before merging equivalent states, which is true.
      static boolean DefaultSimplifyFormula
      The default value of the option of simplifying formula, which is false.
      static boolean DefaultSimplifyIntermediateNBW
      The default value of the option of simplifying intermediate NBW, which is true.
      static boolean DefaultSimplifyNBW
      The default value of the option of simplifying NBW, which is false.
      static boolean DefaultSimplifyNGBW
      The default value of the option of simplifying NGBW, which is false.
      static boolean DefaultSimplifyProjectedNBW
      The default value of the option of simplifying projected NBW, which is false.
      static boolean DefaultSupersetReduction
      The default value of the option of applying superset reduction to a generalized Büchi acceptance condition, which is false.
      static java.lang.String DelegateTranslationSuffix
      The option key of delegating the translation of an un-quantified formula to another translation algorithm.
      static java.lang.String ReduceBeforeMergeSuffix
      Reduce unreachable and dead states before merging equivalent states.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyFormulaSuffix
      The suffix of the option key of simplifying formula.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyIntermediateNBWSuffix
      The suffix of the option key of simplifying intermediate NBW.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyNBWSuffix
      The suffix of the option key of simplifying NBW.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyNGBWSuffix
      The suffix of the option key of simplifying NGBW.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyProjectedNBWSuffix
      The suffix of the option key of simplifying projected NBW.
      static java.lang.String SupersetReductionSuffix
      Reduce acceptance set that contains other acceptance set in a generalized Büchi acceptance condition.

    • Method Detail

      • isSuffixEnabled

        public static boolean isSuffixEnabled(Properties options,
                                      java.lang.String suffix,
                                      boolean def)
        Returns true if an option with a specified suffix is enabled.
        Parameters:
        options - an object containing options
        suffix - a suffix of option name
        def - the default value if there is no such option
        Returns:
        true if an option with a specified suffix is enabled

      • isSimplifyFormula

        public static boolean isSimplifyFormula(Properties options)
        Returns true if the option of simplifying formula is on in a specified options. This method will check the key with the suffix #SimplifyFormulaSuffix in the option.
        Parameters:
        options - user options
        Returns:
        true if the option of simplifying formula is on in options

      • isSimplifyNGBW

        public static boolean isSimplifyNGBW(Properties options)
        Returns true if the option of simplifying NGBW is on in a specified options. This method will check the key with the suffix #SimplifyNGBWSuffix in the option.
        Parameters:
        options - user options
        Returns:
        true if the option of simplifying NGBW is on in options
